definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The control power supply of the counter is the precondition of the counter.
sentences.chinese: 計數管控制電源是它具有良好工作性能的前提。

sentences.english: And the energy linearity and relative detection efficiency of these counters are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了計數管的能量線性和相對探測效率。
